synopsis.text: After a dreamy encounter with a prince, Hibari Hanakoganei's life takes a thrilling turn when she receives her very own cyber pet, a Patapi. Overjoyed, she names the mechanical creature Densuke, who can eat, sleep, play, and assist her in various tasks. But Densuke is far from ordinary, as Hibari soon discovers when nefarious forces attempt to snatch him away. In a surprising twist, Densuke transforms into a powerful cyber-fighter bearing Hibari's likeness. Joined by her friends and their own extraordinary Patapis, Hibari forms the formidable Cyber Team in Akihabara, ready to face off against evil and protect their beloved companions. Prepare for action-packed adventures with this group of friends and their magical cyber pets!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
